html:
3.26.20  11:46 am   how messy is ur room mr.bill

     about the same amount as the world in general

3.26.20  11:08 am   why do cars have doors

     in case you get tired of driving, you can get out

3.26.20  10:43 am   How do you fit so much into a single video without it becoming overwhelming or confusing to viewers?

     the whole key is to think like the viewer

3.26.20  10:31 am   what is this ?

     got to be some sort of website

3.26.20  10:09 am   what are your dreams like

     almost as weird as the real world

3.26.20  9:09 am   Everyone asks where is Bill Wurtz? But nobody asks how is Bill Wurtz? 

     that's not true, that is like the most common question

3.26.20  9:04 am   is this the end of the world?

     no. the world is actually just getting started

3.26.20  8:59 am   can you teach me bass

     yes, the first step is songs

3.26.20  8:15 am   do you ever feel a need for self curation? do you right now? have you ever?

     hm, i wonder if you have been to my website

3.26.20  8:13 am   id like to make a big book, with pictures in as well. do you like books?

     they are pretty cool, but i must confess i am finding it difficult to ignore the fact that computers seem to be able to do exactly the same thing books ever did, 1,000,000,000,000s of times more powerfully

      what is a book you have read before?

     hm, one of the disc world books maybe

3.26.20  7:43 am   Why is your music so good

     could be some type of conspiracy

3.26.20  7:38 am   Is Beans useful?

     yes, that's exactly what it is

3.26.20  7:26 am   Any update on soap?

     sold out

3.26.20  6:43 am   Your lyrics "I'm having a bad day, it's turning into a bad year, all the things I'm supposed to do and the places I'm supposed to go are canceled" couldn't be more real right now. How many times do you think the game's going to change?

     as many times as you are willing to play

3.26.20  6:39 am   What is your favourite type of Melon?

     huge

3.26.20  6:31 am   are you making some long overdue developments and adjustments in the video department

     oh that would explain a lot

3.26.20  6:15 am   best way to get rid of Velcro?

     you can't. Velcro is forever

3.26.20  4:32 am   Have you ever had a thought that maybe your name is Will Burtz but you may have some rare form of undiagnosed dyslexia?

     no

     Do we all have dyslexia and who would be the non-dyslexic to determine dyslexia? How would they know what was organized correctly if they were the outcast non-dyslexic and would they question their judgement? 

     i think you are assuming dyslexia is much more consistent than it is

3.26.20  4:24 am   How to compose a good song?

     impossible. it can't be done

3.26.20  3:43 am   how to avoid overusing metaphors when attempting to solve issues? things get unproductive when i start to stack them, especially

     you could compare the metaphors to something even worse

3.26.20  3:29 am   what is the secret to satisfying chord changes?

     consciousness

3.26.20  3:16 am   Your music is a huge inspiration to my style of music, I'm very glad I discovered you when I did. But, the real question is, is pink really pink, or is it just pink?

     colors are nearly impossible to evaluate without seeing it

     Again thank you :D

3.26.20  3:09 am   Why is my perception of past events so closely tied to my present mood?

     you might be ...........human

      Sometimes I think of a mistake I made and it seems like a horrific catastrophe, but other times I think of the same mistake and it seems like a natural and understandable part of life. Why can't I switch to natural and understandable mode permanently?

     might be too boring for you

3.26.20  2:54 am   what is god to you

     normal

3.26.20  2:26 am   You ever think about making a song about a monkey?

     not really but that seems like the kind of thing that could happen pretty easily, even if by mistake

3.26.20  2:01 am   Will we ever run out of music??

     no

3.26.20  1:40 am   Is there a less tedious way to practice writing melodies (like humming or whatever) cus composing head on can be really slow and disapointing

     it's not clear to me which way you are doing it

3.26.20  1:37 am   Are you mentally stable 

     how did you know

3.26.20  1:14 am   am stunting my musical growth by putting a song  i'm transcribing in a DAW and stretching it so it's reallllyyyy slow so I can pick out all the individual notes

     ah, this is the age old question of whether technology makes us stronger or weaker. and i promise you the answer is both

3.26.20  12:17 am   thoughts on bread on the roof

     mildly inconvenient

3.25.20  11:38 pm   are you the real you

     oh that would explain a lot

3.25.20  11:32 pm   how can i use my mouse off the screen

     you could try putting it on the table

3.25.20  11:17 pm   What if you programmed this site to whenever someone makes a question that has been done before, instead of sending the question to you, it leads the person to your answer of the question when it was done first?

     that seems like a great idea until you remember that many questions have time sensitive answers

3.25.20  11:17 pm   thoughts on hummingbirds wearing a pound of bananas

     deepfake

3.25.20  11:17 pm   Will there be more intelligence to go around for other species?

     yes

3.25.20  11:16 pm   do you have the virus

     not that i know of

3.25.20  10:58 pm   Hows your health?

     very good

3.25.20  10:49 pm   Do find yourself questioning your existence

     yes and no

3.25.20  10:47 pm   When will you start making videos

     as soon as possible

3.25.20  10:47 pm   do you have any recommendations for songs to listen to?

     i recommend you listen to all of them. which i understand creates a crisis of time management. which i also recommend, for strengthening purposes

3.25.20  10:47 pm   If you could ask God any question (assuming there is a God) what would it be?

     what could the purpose be, of the covid-19

3.25.20  10:23 pm   3.14.19 4:33 pm any other muse moments you really like

     that is the only song i know, but i appreciate the preview to that figure, 8 bars earlier

3.25.20  10:07 pm   Do you think you'll do another interview/podcast?

     absolutely. it might be fun to even be the host

3.25.20  9:44 pm   how do you think

     not sure

3.25.20  9:27 pm   whats your home planet ?

     earth

3.25.20  9:24 pm   Does the money printer go brrrrrrr?

     i think so but it's hard to hear it through the closed doors it is behind

3.25.20  8:59 pm   How do you make your songs so cool? What is your secret behind your jingles, Bill.

     the whole trick is to do a conspiracy, and then do conspiracy theory about a different conspiracy, so as to keep the original conspiracy undetected

3.25.20  8:31 pm   When do you answer all those questions

     at Thursday, March 26, 2020 9:32:55 AM, for example

3.25.20  8:22 pm   What word first comes to your mind when you think of Brazil?

     come to

3.25.20  8:14 pm   can you tell me a bedtime story?

     i would consider it
